title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Gold-covered hairballs may reveal why cats eat grass
items.description: Spiky projections on plant matter may act like “drain snakes,” helping felines dislodge wads of fur

items.title: Far more authors use AI to write science papers than admit it, publisher reports
items.description: Finding highlights promise, questions about detectors of AI-generated text

items.title: NIH kicks off yearlong effort to modernize biosafety policies
items.description: New initiative leaves researchers with questions about details and scope

items.title: Weird rings of DNA fuel cancers. This scientist leads the effort to target them
items.description: Paul Mischel and others are testing therapies for rogue genetic loops that drive tumor evolution and growth

items.title: Scientists directly date dino eggshells for the first time
items.description: The new findings narrow age estimates for the clutch of eggs—and may help identify which species laid them

items.title: Great Britain’s economy didn’t completely tank after Romans left, countering conventional wisdom
items.description: “Completely surprising” discovery based on ancient pollutants suggests mining and smelting continued apace for centuries

items.title: ‘Incredible’ fossil reveals earliest relative of lizards and their kin
items.description: Paleontologists use x-rays to reconstruct ancient reptile bones too fragile to remove from rock

items.title: Strongest black hole collision yet confirms theories of Einstein, Hawking
items.description: Observation confirms that a black hole’s area can only grow and never shrink

items.title: The trick to blowing the perfect dandelion
items.description: The umbrellalike tufts resist downward tugs but slip free when lifted up into the wind

items.title: Tiger hologram created with technique from early cinema experiment
items.description: “Holostereosynthesis” can make holograms out of anything with layers
